dashboard_requirements.description: Verify burndown chart configuration and data freshness
Verify cumulative flow diagram for sprint tracking
Verify team velocity calculations and trending

recommended_actions: Priority: Review 50 user stories missing acceptance criteria with QA Tester Agent
Estimation: Have Developer Agent estimate 3 user stories missing story points
Decomposition: Have Developer Agent break down 63 user stories into tasks
Hierarchy: Have Decomposition Agent link 9 orphaned work items to appropriate parents
